column4: Geralt, after some strange mongering returned and learned it was all a hoax to do him evil for not freeing them before.
</br></br>Geralt and demons met again, they gave him strange task, promising this would free them.
Geralt talked to demons for first time.</br>
Geralt convinced the merchant by other means.</br>
Geralt talked to demons for second time.</br>
Geralt talked to demons for second time and lied to them about having the amulet.</br>
Geralt solved the riddle at the magic place and saw Iris' ghosts.</br>
Geralt talked to demons for third and final time.</br>
Geralt talked to demons for third and final time.</br>
Geralt found the merchant where his colleagues are.</br>
One last time Moritz, you have to the set up the loc. reconfigurational device BEFORE casting the spell. You don't simply walk into the wild without a plan for navigation either, don't you?
